sentences.sContent: The lines between salubrious and unwholesome government information are not easy to draw.
sentences.sContent_eng: The lines between salubrious and unwholesome government information are not easy to draw.
sentences.sCn: 有益和有害的政府信息之间的界线并不那么容易划分。

sentences.sContent: His features were pretty yet, and his eye and complexion brighter than I remembered them, though with merely temporary lustre borrowed from the salubrious air and genial sun.
sentences.sContent_eng: His features were pretty yet, and his eye and complexion brighter than I remembered them, though with merely temporary lustre borrowed from the salubrious air and genial sun.
sentences.sCn: 他的相貌挺好看，眼睛和气色也比我所记得的有精神些，虽然那仅仅是从有益健康的空气与和煦的阳光中借来的暂时的光辉。

synos.tran: 清爽的；气候有益健康的

remMethod.val: “是溜百岁” → 是经常遛弯儿让老人活到了百岁 → 有益健康的

words.tran: 有益的，有用的；有益健康的
